permissions.name: view-profile
permissions.description: Allows the user to view their own profile information, including personal details and account settings.

permissions.name: dashboard
permissions.description: Grants access to the dashboard where users can view and manage resources.

roles.name: super-admin
roles.description: The Super Admin has the highest level of access and control over the entire system, including managing users, configuring settings, and overseeing all operations.
